Articles.Content: Keybindings stop working once you exit the game and re-enter it

I make some key bindings in the game, and use them perfectly during the whole game session, and then I exit the game, all normal.
The problem comes when you go back into the game the next time, the key bindings are supposed to still be set, but when you go to play they are the ones that come by default.

I have noticed this problem with my custom time warp bindings. Every time I restart the game the default bindings are active until I open the key binding page then it goes back to my custom ones.  It doesn't lose the bindings they just don't activate automatically for some reason.

Edited March 1, 2023 by Stearmonski
misspelling
It is not the same problem that I have but the truth is that it is also quite strange.
